name: Adam
story: Lord Benchley’s signature eye-twitch is both word and warning of the roiling thoughts beneath his calm, British demeanor. The man holds himself together admirably, but most investigators know to keep some reserve around the poor fellow, lest the twitch settle into a steely glare. Lord Benchley is quite mad of course, having battled the cults for decades and always maintaining the upper hand, if only bar rd-Benchley himself relies on a stiff upper lip, stoic resolve, and indulging his psychotic tendencies
